name: Battle in Cemetery
description:
A one-level 3D game with pixel art styles. Defeat an enemy by crashing on each other and use your shovel to deal an extra damage.

Control
  • W or⬆ for speed boost
  • S or ⬇ for spin brake
  • D or ➡ for turn right
  • A or ⬅ for turn left
  • <Esc> to pause
Rules
  1. Don't park, idle, or stuck near the graveyard
  2. Everything can cause damage (even though it's small)
  3. Spin and frontal attack can do more damage
  4. Speed boost make steering difficult to control
Tips: be patient and do counter attack
Resources
  • Kenney 1-Bit Pack
  • Minimalist Pixel Fonts
  • Musics
